description: This CSS file manages the theming for a web application, defining various CSS variables for light and dark themes, and styles for the main application components.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned content and dynamic background color.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Logo for the application, with animation if motion is preferred.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flex display for content alignment.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Link styling that incorporates theme colors and hover effects.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with responsive styles.
